name: Robo Strike
description:
to start up the game open the file and select extract and then click on the unity logo with the white background.

controls

W, A, S, and D to move. 

Left Shift to slow down time.

1 and 2 to switch weapons.

Mouse Button 0 to shoot.

esc to open pause menu.

this is my first ever game. if there are bugs i am sorry. 

if your framerates are low then you may experience some weird bug and you may not be able to play.
